subject: RE: [junit] Enhancement Request: Assert.fail(Exception e) could b e useful.
msgSnippet: ... Ok, so if you _really_ need it:  include the JUnit-addons library and replace: fail(e.getMessage()); by junitx.framework.Assert.fail(e); -Vladimir --
messageBody:
> I would agree. I spend a lot of time in my unit tests writing the
> structure:
>
> public void testWhatever() {
> setup_stuff_here();
> more_setup_stuff_here();
> try {
> method_under_test();
> } catch(Exception e) {
> fail(e.getMessage());
> }
> }

Ok, so if you _really_ need it: include the JUnit-addons library and replace:

fail(e.getMessage());

by

junitx.framework.Assert.fail(e);

-Vladimir

--
Vladimir Ritz Bossicard
